Login-HeroContent.title: Start Trading in seconds
Login-HeroContent.content: Connect your telegram to start trading instantly

Tizz-HeroContent.heroAd: Experience a new standard in perpetual trading, powered by Bitcoin, where your trading expertise is valued and rewarded. With Tizz, it pays to be a winner.

built-on-bitcoin.title: Built On Bitcoin
built-on-bitcoin.subTitle1: Trustless Trading for a Decentralized Future
built-on-bitcoin.description1: At Tizz, trustless trading isn't just a concept; it' the cornerstone of our platform. Inspired by Bitcoin's decentralized model, we've created a trading environment where users can exchange assets directly, without the need for intermediaries. With trustless trading, every transaction is transparent, secure, and executed with precision, mirroring the ethos of Bitcoin.
built-on-bitcoin.description2: Leverage the unrivaled liquidity of the Bitcoin network on Tizz, where deep liquidity pools ensure smooth and rapid execution of trades. Our platform is designed to tap into the vast global reach of Bitcoin, providing every trader—from the novice to the seasoned—the tools they need for unmatched trading opportunities within DeFi.
built-on-bitcoin.description3: To achieve this level of accessibility and decentralization, Tizz is built on Botanix L-2 technology. This layer-2 solution enhances scalability and efficiency while maintaining the security and decentralization that dHarnessing the robustness of Spiderchain integrated with Supra oracles, foundational elements that enhance Tizz’s ecosystem. This blend ensures all transactions on Tizz not only uphold stringent security standards but also benefit from enhanced reliability and accuracy of data. It’s a secure, interconnected environment where trustless trading isn’t just a promise—it’s reality.efine Bitcoin's network. With Botanix L-2, Tizz users can enjoy lightning-fast transactions and a seamless trading experience, all while contributing to the growth of the global decentralized economy.

satistics.title: Tap into Bitcoin's Economic Power
satistics.description: Billions in daily transactions reveal Bitcoin's massive market scale and hint at its growing potential. With such vibrant market activity, why trade anywhere that doesn't let you stay directly exposed to Bitcoin's price movements?

Tizz-Content.compete-and-conquer-description: Dive into Tizz’s competitive trading arena: compete alone or join forces in a hive, engage in thrilling trading competitions, and rise through the ranks.

card1.title: Tizz Trading Hives
card1.description: Join forces with like-minded traders in Tizz Trading Hives to strategize and dominate the markets. These hives foster a spirit of competition where teamwork amplifies success, with each victory celebrated and rewarded collectively. Elevate your trading game by leveraging shared insights and strategies to outperform the competition.

card2.title: Privary
card2.description: We prioritize user privacy. Our platform operates without the need for Know Your Customer (KYC) verification,, ensuring that your personal information remains confidential. We do not engage in data harvesting or record IP addresses, giving you peace of mind while you trade.

card3.title: Leaderboard
card3.description: Ascend the ranks on Tizz's leaderboards, where every trade pushes you closer to the top. Showcase your trading prowess, draw insights from the elite, and etch your name among the best. It’s not just about trading; it’s about dominating the competition and celebrating your victories.

card4.title: Maximize your trading rewards on Tizz
card4.description: Collect more than just profits. Harvest a wealth of perks including token airdrops, Pollen Points, and exclusive giveaways. With our profit-sharing model, every trade you make adds to your share of the profit reward. Because at Tizz, winners truly deserve better.

how-you-earn.title: How You Earn

card1.title: Socialities
card1.description: Earn Nectar by creating buzz about Tizz on social media. Every share, like, and comment enriches your account, transforming your  engagement into tangible rewards.

card2.title: Individual Traders
card2.description: Trade your way to the top on Tizz: Your trading skill earns you Pollen,  turning every trade into more than just profit. Explore strategies and build your reputation while enhancing your rewards.

card3.title: Hives
card3.description: Collaborate with traders to leverage your hive's strength. Compete in exclusive competitions, share in the profits, and boost your hive's Pollen rewards, benefiting every member's success.

how-you-earn.description: Earn Nectar through referrals and social engagement, and Pollen for trading victories, boosting your potential returns.

be-the-first-to-know.title: Be the first to know
be-the-first-to-know.description: Here, excellence isn't just acknowledged—it's compensated, ensuring winners always find their edge.
be-the-first-to-know.exclusive-access: Exclusive Access: Step ahead of the public launch and explore Tizz’s full capabilities.
be-the-first-to-know.priority-support: Priority Support: Receive immediate assistance from our expert team, ensuring a smooth trading experience from day one.

card1.title: Become Part of the Colony
card1.description: Stay informed and involved with the Tizz community. Keep up with project  updates and announcements while engaging with fellow enthusiasts to  discuss trends and strategies.

card2.title: Community Forums
card2.description: Dive into deeper discussions in our community forums. Share your trading insights,  ask questions, and collaborate with your hive and other traders to refine your strategies.

card3.title: Resources & Documentation
card3.description: Dive into our detailed Gitbook for insights into Tizz’s platform. It's  your go-to resource for understanding our features, trading mechanics,  and the technology behind our operations.

Trade-DepositCard.description1: Deposit DAI in exchange for gDAI, an ERC-20 representing your ownership in the vault. Stakers receive fees from each trade placed on the platform in exchange for serving as the counterparty to all trades. gDAI accumulates these fees in real-time.
Trade-DepositCard.description2: Please be aware, you can't immediately withdraw your assets. Withdraws follow an epoch system described on the Withdraw panel.

Trade-VaultCard.description: Liquidity pool incentives are live! Click here for active pools

Trade-TeamCreationSuccessModal.description: Celebrate your achievement! Your team has been successfully created. Dive deeper into your team's details and start collaborating with your members by exploring your team profile.

Trade-TeamCreation.description: Start building the ultimate hive. Collaborate on social trading or compete to be the best. Together, earn Pollen and get rewarded as winners.

Trade-TeamMembers.you-dont-have-a-team-yet: You don’t have a team yet

Trade-TeamSummary.are-you-sure-to-join-this-team: Are you sure to join this team?

Trade-TradeDetailPanel.est-excution-price-description: The estimated price including spread at which your trade will execute. There will be no spread when closing the trade.
Trade-TradeDetailPanel.slippage-description: Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage.
Trade-TradeDetailPanel.liq-price-description: If this price is reached, your postion will be closed and your collateral lost.

Trade-VaultDepositCard.deposit-description: Deposit {collateralType} in exchange for tz{collateralType}, an ERC-20 representing your ownership in the vault. Stakers receive fees from each trade placed on the platform in exchange for serving as the counterparty to all trades. tz{collateralType} accumulates these fees in real-time.
Trade-VaultDepositCard.deposit-notify: Please be aware, you can't immediately withdraw your assets. Withdraws follow an epoch system described on the Withdraw panel.
Trade-VaultDepositCard.withdraw-description: Withdraws follow an epoch system. Each epoch is 72 hours long. You can make a request to withdraw your assets during the first 48 hours of any epoch, but you must wait until a specific withdraw epoch to actually withdraw them. Depending on the collateralization ratio of the vault, your withdraw epoch will be between 1 and 3 epochs later. You must withdraw your assets in the first 48 hours of your withdraw epoch, otherwise a new request is required.

Trade-VaultMainCard.description: Liquidity pool incentives are live! Click here for active pools

GeoBlockModal.description: Sorry! It looks like you're try to access Tizz from a restricted area!
